description: Use logical reasoning to solve the following problem clearly and correctly:

dev_examples.input: All mammals are animals. All dogs are mammals. Are all dogs animals?
dev_examples.output: Yes. If all mammals are animals and all dogs are mammals, then all dogs are animals.

dev_examples.input: If a person studies hard, they will pass the exam. Alice studies hard. Will Alice pass the exam?
dev_examples.output: Yes. Given that studying hard leads to passing the exam and Alice studies hard, Alice will pass the exam.

eval_example.input: All squares are rectangles. All rectangles have four sides. Can we conclude that all squares have four sides?
